thread.title: Marketing Manager, GOLF - Sports Equipment

title: Marketing Manager, GOLF - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Marketing Manager, GOLF Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Collaborates with retail stores for POP. Manages the internal and external communication process to support the brand building initiatives. Works closely with the PR on campaigns such as brand message, product and placement.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
